Class Client

java.lang.Object
Client
public class Client extends Object
A controller class for the part of the program that controls the other computer. Sends data between the UI and the necessary models (i.e. the MouseStreamer and ScreenListener). This class also sets up the connection between it and the server with a Socket.

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client​(int port, String IP, int initialWidth, int initialHeight)
      Constructs a client with a port and IP to try to connect to and an initial width and height for the UI. When constructed, the client immediately attempts to connect to the server using the provided IP and port.
      Parameters:
      port - The port the client should try to connect on.
      IP - The IP the client should try to connect to.
      initialWidth - The initial width to use for the UI.
      initialHeight - The initial height to use for the UI.

  • Method Details

    • updateScreen

      public void updateScreen​(ImageIcon im)
      Updates the UI with the incoming image of the server's screen.
      Parameters:
      im - Image of the server's screen.

    • fitToSize

      private ImageIcon fitToSize​(ImageIcon srcIco, int width, int height)
      Fits an ImageIcon to the specified width and height, i.e. gets the largest width and height that the ImageIcon can have and still fit inside the specified dimensions.
      Parameters:
      srcIco - The ImageIcon that will be used to create a new, fitted ImageIcon.
      width - The width that the new ImageIcon should fit into.
      height - The height that the new ImageIcon should fit into.
      Returns:
      A new ImageIcon that fits inside the specified width and height.

    • calcSizeFromBounds

      private Dimension calcSizeFromBounds​(ImageIcon ico, int width, int height)
      Calculates the width and height that an ImageIcon should have to fit inside the specified bounds (width and height).
      Parameters:
      ico - The ImageIcon used to determine proper width and height of a fitted icon.
      width - The width that the ImageIcon needs to fit into.
      height - The height that the ImageIcon needs to fit into.
      Returns:
      A dimension describing the width and height an ImageIcon should have to fit inside the specified width and height.
